name: GroupShift
description: A mod that makes it easy to copy triggers!

issues.info: You can report issues on the mod's Github page!

show-underlines.name: Show Label Underlines
show-underlines.description: Disables the underlines beneath trigger property labels.

show-notifications.name: Show Notifications
show-notifications.description: Disables the success notifications when shifting groups or properties. Does not affect the error notifications.
